answers.answer: I dont suggest to read about it because then your mind will wander off and think the worst lets just hope they dont have to and they can fix it
Well preeclampsisa can be very dangerous to the baby so it's better for him to be out then in at this point!
Good luck darl, you'll be fine, and so will baby. How high was your blood pressure? I had pre eclampsia for 3 weeks before i delivered early, it gradually just gor worse.

Yea I'm not to scared since they caught it now I'm just at hospital waiting for dr and Tey haven't told me anything else so I dk of he decided to take the baby he sounded like he was going to at te dr office so I have no idea he said he's around 6 lbs and with having protein in my urine I don't see him not taking him I dk if it will be a c Section or induce I am outta the loop as of now

at my 35 week appointment i had protein n high blood pressure , i had fortnighlty scans anyway due to diabetes , i was put on blood pressure tablets and had be monitored i was also told they would deliver early but it stayed controlled enough i delvered at 38+4 by being induced, i hope they can calm yours down a lil
Yea I'm just waiting for the dr to come in and decide what he wants to do lol

question: So I went to my d appt today and I have high blood pressure and protein in my urine he sent me to the hospital and symptoms of preeclampsia  and said he's prolly gunna take the baby today I'm 35 weeks he's 6 lbs so my baby boy could be here today I'm waiting for th dr to come and nurses still I feel so in the dark about everything I have no idea what's going on :(
title: Pre eclampsia
